item.description: Hello Moms! I am new to the area and just had a baby girl 3 months ago. I was hoping to find other Russian families with young children in the Newton area who would be interested in getting together weekly. I am trying to raise my daughter bilingual so want her to hear russian language more often. Kids can play and moms would enjoy tea and conversation. I am happy to host the first playgroup! (I can have 4-5 moms at my house).

group.name: Families with Russian Kids, Moms Club, Playgroups

item.name: Playgroup for Moms/Babies Age 0-12months
